description: Structural detail sheet continuing from S2, focused on roof framing, header framing at openings, DTC clip details and spacing, and blocking connections. Contains 9 numbered details covering roof-to-wall connections, hip roof framing plan, and DTC clip installation.
key_content: Header framing: 8'-0" max opening = (1) trimmer, 12'-0" max opening = (2) trimmers
Header nailing: 2-16d top each side, 2-16d each stud
DTC clips can be omitted at interior walls
Simpson DTC clip: connect with 4-8d nails (two each side), 12d nail (1-1/2") typ.
DTC clip max spacing table: varies by wall height and gypsum board configuration
Hip roof framing plan: 2x rafters @ 16" O.C., hip rafters from corners, blocking at bearing walls
Blocking perpendicular to joist: 48" O.C. max, 3-16d connection at blocking
Blocking parallel to joist: 3-16d conn blocking, DTC at blocking typ.
Roof framing connection: 20 qty 10d common nails to top plate for rafter/truss to wall
Stud wall framing detail (Detail 5) — rafter to double top plate connection
NOT SHOWN: hurricane tie specific model number (connection method referenced but not named)
NOT SHOWN: rafter size specification (shown as 2x but depth not explicitly called out in legible text)

drawing_zones.content: Header framing at openings — trimmer rules, nailing, king stud/cripple stud diagram
Roof framing structural notes and ridge connection detail
Hip roof framing plan view — rafter layout, DTC at hips, blocking
Roof framing section / wall-to-roof connection detail
Simpson DTC clip installation detail and nailing specs
DTC clip perpendicular to joist (Detail A) and parallel to joist (Detail B) sections
DTC clip max spacing table by wall height and gypsum configuration
